definition: at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at
to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon
Contemporary New Confucianism/see 新儒家[Xin1 Ru2 jia1]

sentences.english: The South Korean government spends millions promoting contemporary Korean culture abroad.
sentences.chinese: 韩国政府花了数百万的钱推广当代韩国文化。

sentences.english: This article verifies the basic concept of counter-intelligence activities.
sentences.chinese: 本文明确了当代反情报活动的基本概念。

sentences.english: Constructivism is a revolution of contemporary educational psychology.
sentences.chinese: 建构主义是当代教育心理学的一场革命。

sentences.english: At first glance, it seems like the sort of story that falls in with the rest of the modern genre.
sentences.chinese: 初看来，这部书似乎与当代流派的其他作品类似。

sentences.english: Mailijian Mattress advances for the present ages, and benefits for future.
sentences.chinese: “美力坚”床垫利在当代，功在千秋。

sentences.english: Blow-up", a Discussional Basis for "Contemporary Arts"
sentences.chinese: “放大”，作为一种策略的“当代艺术”讨论的基点。

sentences.english: Khiva's name became synonymous with cruelty and barbarity in contemporary Britain when, in 1842, two army officers, Colonel Charles Stoddart and Captain Arthur Conolly, were beheaded here in public.
sentences.chinese: 在当代英国，希瓦这个名字是残暴和野蛮的同义词。

sentences.english: How do you feel when you think of all the competing writers within the African-American contemporary novel industry?
sentences.chinese: 当想到当代非美小说界所有竞争作家时你是怎样想的？

sentences.english: The contemporary art esteems vigorously which by US occupies the mainstream status forcefully.
sentences.chinese: 由美国极力推崇的当代艺术强行占据主流地位。

sentences.english: Zeng Fanzhi is undoubtedly one of the most important Chinese contemporary artists to date.
sentences.chinese: 曾梵志无疑是中国当代最重量级的画家之一。

sentences.english: The fourth chapter is on establishing a contemporary Chinese cultural symbol system.
sentences.chinese: 第四章是创造中华民族的当代艺术符号语言。

sentences.english: Sana is a authoress of Daur who began her writing in early 1990's.
sentences.chinese: 萨娜是于九十年代初走上文坛的达斡尔族当代女作家。

sentences.english: He founded an authentic transaction network for famous Chinese modern paintings and calligraphies in 2004.
sentences.chinese: 2004年创办中国当代名家书画保真交易网。

sentences.english: Contemporary society, people have produced the serious self-contradiction.
sentences.chinese: 当代社会人的自我矛盾甚至自我分裂已是灾难性问题。

sentences.english: Zhou Yang occupies an important place in contemporary and modern literary theory of China.
sentences.chinese: 周扬在中国现当代文论史上占有重要地位。

definition: Cenozoic (geological era covering the last 65m years)
